name: Into the Darkness Below (Skill Card)
text:
Yami Bakura / Skill
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
Activate this Skill during your Main Phase.
Once per turn, you can discard 1 Normal Fiend Monster, then use 1 of the following Skills.
● Draw 1 card, also flip this card over.
● If you have 4 or more Fiend Normal Monsters with different names in your GY, add 1 monster from your Deck to your hand, also flip this card over.
